title: AI boom drives data-center dealmaking to record high, says report
description: Global data-center dealmaking surged to a record high through November this year, driven by an insatiable demand for computing infrastructure to meet the boom in artificial intelligence usage.
content:
Dec 19 (Reuters) - Global data-center dealmaking surged to a record high through November this year, driven by an insatiable demand for computing infrastructure to meet the boom in artificial intelligence usage.

title: A realistic vision for the future of AI in mental health care
description: A new analysis examines a potential turning point for artificial intelligence in mental health care. The article, "Feasible but Fragile": An Inflection Point for Artificial Intelligence in Mental Health Care, reflects on the November 18, 2025 United States House Energy and Commerce Subcommittee hearing on AI chatbots and features an interview with John Torous, MBI, MD, Director of Digital Psychiatry at Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center and Associate Professor of Psychiatry at Harvard Medical School.
content: A new analysis examines a potential turning point for artificial intelligence in mental health care. The article, "Feasible but Fragile": An Inflection Point for Artificial Intelligence in Mental Health Care, reflects on the November 18, 2025 United ... [2689 chars]

title: High-paying careers of the future: How AI is reshaping the U.S. job market
description: High-Paying Careers are evolving quickly as artificial intelligence and automation transform the U.S. job market. While technology is impacting almost every profession, human-centered roles continue to be essential across industries. Experts highlight that future workers must combine technical awareness with communication, creativity, and problem-solving skills. Sectors such as healthcare, social services, and skilled trades are anticipated to watch sustained demand in regard to aging populations and hands-on requirements.

title: AI chip firm Cerebras set to file for US IPO after delay, sources say
description: The company, which develops high-performance processors for artificial intelligence workloads, withdrew its prior IPO filing in ‌October, days ‌after announcing it had raised over $1 billion in a fundraising round that valued the ‌AI chipmaker at $8 billion.

title: LeanHash Announces Global Launch of its Web3-Based AI Cloud Computing Platform
description: New York, USA, Dec. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- LeanHash today announced the global launch of its Web3-based artificial intelligence (AI) cloud computing investment platform. This platform aims to expand access to distributed computing infrastructure to meet the growing demand for AI-driven processing resources across the digital economy.
